input.sentences: the birthday is smiling for a photo .
two buddies are happy at the party .
two friends are smiling for the photo .
the birthday is getting ready to blow out his many candles .
the birthday boy is blowing a noise maker .
output.sentences: We took a picture of my dad smiling on his birthday.
He was happy that so many of his buddies came to his party.
He was smiling in every photo with his friends.
He was ready to blow out his candles.
We even had a noisemaker for the birthday boy.
